mapper.select: SELECT event_id, event_name, description, start_date_time, end_date_time, location, organizer, max_participants, current_participants, status, created_at, updated_at FROM events ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT event_id, event_name, description, start_date_time, end_date_time, location, organizer, max_participants, current_participants, status, created_at, updated_at FROM events WHERE event_id = #{eventId}

SELECT event_id, event_name, description, start_date_time, end_date_time, location, organizer, max_participants, current_participants, status, created_at, updated_at FROM events WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY start_date_time

SELECT event_id, event_name, description, start_date_time, end_date_time, location, organizer, max_participants, current_participants, status, created_at, updated_at FROM events WHERE organizer = #{organizer} ORDER BY start_date_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events ( event_name, description, start_date_time, end_date_time, location, organizer, max_participants, current_participants, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{eventName}, #{description}, #{startDateTime}, #{endDateTime}, #{location}, #{organizer}, #{maxParticipants}, #{currentParticipants}, #{status}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET event_name = #{eventName}, description = #{description}, start_date_time = #{startDateTime}, end_date_time = #{endDateTime}, location = #{location}, organizer = #{organizer}, max_participants = #{maxParticipants}, current_participants = #{currentParticipants}, status = #{status}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE event_id = #{eventId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM events WHERE status = #{status}
